thread.title: Kim Kardashian West Shares More Life-Affirming Family Album Photos on Instagram
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian West Shares More Life-Affirming Family Album Photos on Instagram

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Kim Kardashian West Shares More Life-Affirming Family Album Photos on Instagram
text:
Share Tweet Email WhatsApp Comments 
It would appear speculation about Kanye West and Kim Kardashian’s marriage hitting rocky territory couldn’t be further from the truth. Following up her recent home video post, Kim has once again taken to Instagram, this time sharing a bunch of heart-warming photos lifted straight from the family album. 
Until last week, Kim had assumed a dormant presence on the platform following her infamous robbery in Paris. But now, the reality star is back in the full-swing habit of doing what she does best: providing us with morsels of information and a behind-the-velvet-curtain look at life with ‘Ye. And life with ‘Ye couldn’t be much sweeter if these pics are to be believed, with one caption claiming that “[Kanye] always has my back”. Aww. 
Kanye can be seen playing father to Saint and North throughout, while one candid snap shows the rapper chowing down on some soup. Sitting on a green sofa with Saint, Kanye appears to be sporting an all-white version of a sneaker from his yet-to-be-released Calabasas range, along with a grey Champion hoodie. A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jan 4, 2017 at 9:54am PST Jan 5, 2017 at 9:23am PST ❤❤️👶🏽👧🏽 A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jan 5, 2017 at 9:29am PST 👱🏿 A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jan 6, 2017 at 9:39am PST A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jan 6, 2017 at 10:48am PST
